pages.text: While reading the scroll on the secrets of $(l:mutations/ravaged)Ravagers$(), you've came up with an idea of creating specialize armor that augments their already $(l:crafts/ominous_saddle)armored saddles$().

Creating armor for the massive beast requires a lot of Iron and metal but it will provide a large amount of protection for the newly transformed $(l:mutations/ravaged)Ravager$(). However, the $(l:mutations/ravaged)Ravager$() must be $(l:crafts/ominous_saddle)Saddled$() before applying the armor. You've heard rumors that you're not the first to think of armoring up Ravagers...
